name: Super Dodger (tonybony725)
description:
Collaborated with Keiry Gao(https://itch.io/profile/keirykiri) and Jack Liu(https://subxeroiq.itch.io/)

Single-player/Multi-player game involving dodging

Use a, d, and spacebar to move

Fall off platform = lose and big noob

Credits

Photon PUN 2

You Say Run OST - My Hero Academia

Legend of Zipangu/Henesys - Maplestory

bonk sound effect #2

bruh sound effect

Youtube tutorials and other resources

Assets(excluding backgrounds) are original and drawn by me.

Hit up my dms for some insane art commissions XD
